mapper.insert: insert into t_flow_node (id, fid, node_name, role_fid, remark, state, parent_fid, next_fid, is_del, last_modify_by, last_modify_fid, create_time, last_modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{parentFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_flow_node
fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
node_name = #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role_fid = #{roleFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
parent_fid = #{parentFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
next_fid = #{nextFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
last_modify_by = #{lastModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modify_fid = #{lastModifyFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_flow_node set fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, node_name = #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_fid = #{roleFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, parent_fid = #{parentFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, next_fid = #{nextFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, last_modify_by = #{lastModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_fid = #{lastModifyFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_flow_node set lastModifyBy=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastModifyFid=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT} where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_flow_node
node_name = #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role_fid = #{roleFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_fid = #{parentFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
next_fid = #{nextFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_modify_by = #{lastModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modify_fid = #{lastModifyFid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where flow_fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select tfn.id, tfn.fid, tfn.node_name,tfn.flow_fid , tfn.role_fid, tfn.remark, tfn.state, tfn.parent_fid, tfn.next_fid, tfn.is_del, tfn.last_modify_by, tfn.last_modify_fid, tfn.create_time, tfn.last_modify_time,tu.name userName,tf.remark flowRemark from t_flow_node as tfn,t_flow as tf,t_user as tu WHERE tfn.flow_fid = tf.fid and tf.user_fid = tu.uuid AND tu.is_del = 0 AND tfn.is_del = 0 AND tf.is_del = 0 AND tfn.state = 1 and tfn.role_fid in
#{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
